judges: Before, Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court affirming the order of the Court of Quarter Sessions of Allegheny County is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Rhodes.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Irwin I. Try on and Jason Richardson, for appellants.
Robert A. Rundle, Louis Rosenberg and Wright & Rundle, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Whitehall Borough Incorporation Case.
Argued October 3, 1947.
Before, Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Irwin I. Try on and Jason Richardson, for appellants.
Robert A. Rundle, Louis Rosenberg and Wright & Rundle, for appellees.
November 24, 1947:
